title: Bug 38412[Actions] Navigator tree cell editors too small
description: Bug 38412[Actions] Navigator tree cell editors too small
OB: I20030528MacOS X 10.2.6 start Eclipse in the Navigator select any resource from the context menu select "Rename"Observe:the cell editor field is too small and leaves only the upper half of the text visible.
SR: I20030528MacOS X 10.2.6 start Eclipse in the Navigator select any resource from the context menu select "Rename"Observe:the cell editor field is too small and leaves only the upper half of the text visible.
